          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Weather 3</string>
            <string language="en">Weather 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivez à à 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καιρός 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiempo 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this drag’n’drop exercise you can check yourself on different types of weather.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this drag'n'drop exercise you can check yourself Wednesday different types of weather. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">weather</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser drag'n'drop Übung können Sie sich 
überprüfen Mittwoch unterschiedliche Typen des Wetters. Safir 
- Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice de drag'n'drop vous pouvez vous 
contrôler mercredi où les différents types de survivent à. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 -
combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício do drag'n'drop você pode 
verificar-se tipos diferentes de quarta-feira de tempo. Safir - 
vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto 
é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione del drag'n'drop potete 
controllarsi tipi differenti di mercoledì di tempi. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση drag'n'drop μπορείτε να 
ελεγχθείτε ότι Τετάρτη διαφορετική δακτυλογραφείτε του καιρού. 
Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους 
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio del drag'n'drop usted puede 
controlarse diversos tipos de miércoles de tiempo. ¿Safir - 
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es
él?</string>
          </description>
